duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional customer service to guests, ensuring a positive and memorable experience.
Collaborate with team members to ensure efficient and effective operations, maintaining a clean and organized environment.
Demonstrate attention to detail in all tasks, from order accuracy to facility cleanliness and maintenance.
Manage time effectively to handle guest inquiries, requests, and orders in a timely manner.
Utilize strong communication skills to interact with guests and team members in a professional and courteous manner.
Resolve any issues or challenges that arise, using problem-solving skills to find suitable solutions.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Bachelor's degree preferred)
